about_me.des: Professionally I am main Android Developer for Docplanner, where I write on Kotlin. I am also doing Machine Learning projects. I write articles and develop Open-Source libraries. I also have double engineer title, from Computer Science and Telecommunication. Occasionally I have a pleasure to make some lecture. Mostly about Kotlin, Android and RxJava. Together with my girlfriend we created Nootro - startup that is producing and selling supplements for brain

projects.DocplannerDoctor: Mobile application for Docplanner. It allows doctors to easily manage their schedule and contact with patients.
projects.WartaMobile: Mobile application made for Warta - the polish popular insurance company. Application helps for Warta clients to easily and quickly go through process of closing insurance claim.
projects.ActivityStarter: Android Library that provides simpler way to start the Activities with multiple arguments.
projects.KotlinWonders: Artificial intelligence for "7 wonders" board game. Written completely functionally in Kotlin.
projects.KotlinPreferences: Kotlin Android Library, that makes preference usage easy.
projects.PreferenceHolder: Kotlin Android Library, that makes SharedPreferences usage as simple and fun as possible.
projects.StackTester: Applicaction for testing different stack flags.
projects.Nootro: Startup creating and selling brain improvement supplement.

career.docplanner_des: Main Android Developer creating doctor and patient mobile applications.
career.apreel_des: Creation of Warta Mobile application for Warta.
career.samsung_des: Development of RTL - remote testing tool for Android Samsung devices.
career.college_des: I get engeneer title from Telecommunication (finished with A), and another engineer title in Computer Science (also with A). Both courses were finished on Warsaw University of Technology - biggest and most prestigious technical university in Poland.

speaking.reactivex: Article 'ReactiveX - reactive programming in nearly any language'
speaking.reactivex_des: Programmer Magazine - biggest programmer magazine in Poland
speaking.kotlinarticle_des: Programmer Magazine - biggest programmer magazine in Poland
speaking.mv: MVC, MVP, MVVM. What are they? What are the differences?
speaking.mv_des: Warszawskie Dni Informatyki - biggest programming event in Poland
